name: 14.08 - Demolition, Removal, Salvage & Re-erection of Road Furniture
template name: 14.08 - Demolition, Removal, Salvage & Re-erection of Road Furniture

name: 1 - The items of road furniture to be demolished and disposed of are listed in Clause 3 of MRTS14.1
2 - Seven days prior to commencement, the Contractor shall submit a schedule of items to be salvaged in accordance with the design documentation.
3 - Dismantling and removal shall not commence until expiration of the seven day period.
4 - Salvaged materials shall be transported and stored in accordance with Cluase 1.2 of MRTS14.1
5 - Seven days prior to commencement, the Contractor shall submit a schedule of items to be dismantled for re-erection in accordance with the design documentation.
6 - Dismantling and removal shall not commence until expiration of the seven day period.
